Text: Ulp... Lady Alpha really is strong...

Looks like you've calmed down. Make sure to arrange
to repair the door you broke.
Yes, ma'am...
Seriously...

(The situation and mood are completely off... The
atmosphere just isn't right for giving chocolates
now...)
Lady Alpha! Now's your chance!
Huh?

If you've resolved yourself to giving them to him,
then you must follow through to the end!
Lambda... Alright.
Ci...Cid!
Huh? Yeah, what?
I prepared chocolates for you. Will you accept them?
For me? Wait, did you make them yourself?

Yes. They're made with my gratitude. I may not be
able to repay everything you've done for me, but...

(This situation is far from romantic, and I haven't
managed to do what I trained for. He might be
disappointed, but...)
(I have to convey my feelings...!)
Oh, thanks. I really appreciate it.
Really...appreciate it? Honestly...?

Yeah, honestly. "Gratitude" sounds a bit over the
top, but since you made it yourself, I'm sure they're
delicious.

(He's genuinely happy... It's like he's accepting me
just as I am...)
I'm happy to hear that...truly.
Ulp... Was I maybe not supposed to be here...?

Breaking into places and taking out your allies is
never commendable.
S-Sorry...

But, thanks to you, Delta, I've come to realize the
importance of expressing my emotions honestly.
So, thank you.

...Huh? A pat on the head? Even though I was just
scolded?

Right, all's well that ends well. Not that I really
understand what just happened.

By the way, is it okay for me to eat this chocolate
now? Can I open it?

Of course. But it might have been crushed during the
fight just now...
Nah, I think it's fine. Look—
Whew, it's okay...! It held together.
Yes. It's as perfect as when it was made.

By the way, Lady Delta, you wanted to eat meat and
potatoes, didn't you? Lambda can make some for
you just right over there.
...Heheh. I see where this is going.

Lambda is quite a good cook, you know. Why not try
some?
Meat and potatoes! I wanna eat some!

Right. Then, please come this way.
...You too, Lambda.
What are you three suddenly on about—
...Ah, right. Back to the original plan, huh.

Well then, Master Shadow, Lady Alpha, we'll take our
leave.
She wanted to eat meat and potatoes that badly?
It seems so. Well then, shall we eat the chocolates?

Yes, let's eat... Mmm! Delicious! It's so creamy
with just the right sweetness!

They're fancier than store-bought ones. As expected,
Alpha, even your chocolate-making skills are
impeccable.

Heheh... Hearing that from you makes the effort I
put into making them completely worthwhile.
...Hey, Cid, are they really delicious?
Yes, delicious... Wait, didn't I just say that?
Heheh. Maybe. I like hearing it again.

I ended up spending quite a bit of time with Alpha.
Hmm, the quality of those chocolates... I wonder if
they could be commercialized.

That said, it seems no one noticed. Alpha seemed
happy as well, so that's a relief.

The moment Delta charged, I secretly protected the
chocolate with a slime barrier! It's one of my
secret techniques—"Seriously Hard Coating"!

(And to think, the chocolate I protected was for me.
Well, I'll make it up to her gradually over time.)

After all, I want to continue playing these
shadowbroker games with Alpha!

Nodding with a content expression, he mutters
slightly bizarre things as he vanishes into the
darkness of the night...
